get.description: Retrieves a list of the high-level metadata for all tasks.
Retrieves detailed metadata for the task with provided id (inputs, outputs, etc.).

403.description: Forbidden - User does not have permission to access task

404.description: No task found with provided id

get.description: Retrieves a list of the high-level metadata for all jobs (paginated).

post.summary: Create and launch a new job

inputs.description: Inputs object (as dictated by the specific inputs for a given task)

403.description: Forbidden - User does not have permission to execute job with provided task

get.description: Retrieves detailed metadata for the job with provided id.

403.description: Forbidden - User does not have permission to access task

404.description: No task found with provided id

get.description: Retrieves status of the job with provided id.

403.description: Forbidden - User does not have permission to access job

404.description: No job found with provided id

get.description: Retrieves detailed metadata for the job with provided id (execution history).

403.description: Forbidden - User does not have permission to access task with provided id

404.description: No task found with provided id

get.description: Retrieves a list of the high-level metadata for all batches (paginated).

post.description: Uploads a JSONL file and launches a new batch with the provided data. Returns the batch id.

file.description: A JSONL file containing objects with the format: { "data_uuid": string, "autoloop_input_array": array }

403.description: Forbidden - User does not have permission to create a new batch

get.description: Retrieves detailed metadata for the batch with provided id.

403.description: Forbidden - User does not have permission to access batch

404.description: No batch found with provided id

put.description: Update a batch metadata. Return the response code and the batch metadata.

403.description: Forbidden - User does not have permission to update this batch

get.description: Retrieves list of jobs metadata (paginated) associated with a given batch.

200.description: Successfully retrieved jobs from batch id

403.description: Forbidden - User does not have permission to access batch with provided id

404.description: No jobs found from batch with provided batch id

post.description: Launches a batch with the provided data. Returns the batch id along with response status.

403.description: Forbidden - User does not have permission to launch batch with provided id

get.description: Get batch execution status. Returns the batch execution status code (CREATED, QUEUED, IN_PROGRESS, COMPLETED, FAILED) along with response status.
Get batch execution results once a batch reaches COMPLETED status. Receive the raw output or data to download depending on flag selection.
